Question Number 12:

write the times function.

times function must be called with a number

const tenTimes = times(10);
console.log(typeof tenTimes);// logs function
console.log(tenTimes(5));// logs 50
const fiveTimes = times(5);
console.log(fiveTimes(5));//logs 25
const badTimes = times('x');//throw an exception

please export you function at the end: module.exports = yourFunction
